Utility to enable dependency injection.

          Injects dependencies from the Environment to the given object.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Method Detail

injectBeans

public static void injectBeans(Environment env,
                               Object object)
Injects dependencies from the Environment to the given object. The method looks for methods of object that have a form of inject<DependecyInterfaceName>(<DependecyInterfaceName>). It is expected that <DependecyInterfaceName> is a key to find the necessary object from the Environment.

There is a way to make all widgets have their dependencies injected before their init() method is called. To enable it, they should have a parent class that invokes this method right before the widget's init() method is called.

For example, the parent widget class may have code like this: 


   public Component.Interface _getComponent() {
     return new ComponentImpl();
   }
 
   protected class ComponentImpl extends BaseApplicationWidget.ComponentImpl {
 
     private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
 
     public synchronized void init(Scope scope, Environment env) {
       setGlobalEventListener(new ProxyEventListener(MyBaseWidget.this));
       SpringInjectionUtil.injectBeans(env, MyBaseWidget.this);
       super.init(scope, env);
     }
   }

Parameters:
env - The Environment that is expected to contain the dependency objects.
object - The object that is expected to have some methods with "inject" prefix that should be invoked to set inject dependencies.
